solution_line_template: Matt received twice as many apples as Mike received oranges, so he got {mike_oranges} * {matt_multiplier} = <<{mike_oranges}*{matt_multiplier}={matt_apples}>>{matt_apples} apples.
So in total, all children received {mike_oranges} + {matt_apples} + {mark_bananas} = <<{mike_oranges}+{matt_apples}+{mark_bananas}={total_fruits}>>{total_fruits} fruits.
